solution_line_template: Mike started by throwing {seeds_left_group} seeds to the birds and then threw twice as many, {seeds_left_group} + {seeds_left_group}({multiplier_right_group}) = {seeds_left_group} + {seeds_right_group}.

He also threw {seeds_more_birds} other seeds and had {seeds_left_over} left over, which means he started with {total_first_two_throws} + {seeds_more_birds} + {seeds_left_over} = <<{total_first_two_throws}+{seeds_more_birds}+{seeds_left_over}={initial_seeds}>>{initial_seeds} seeds.
